## Description
 &#10;&#9;&#9;Smectite is the name used for a group of phyllo-silicate mineral species.&#10;&#9;&#9;It&#39;s a clay-like regolith derived mineral deposit in NASA Water ISRU Study Reference Case C. 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Ore|
|Form:|Solid|
